bill_title: exempt certain nonprofit organizations from sales and use tax when transporting elderly or disabled persons.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt certain nonprofit organizations from sales and use tax when transporting elderly or disabled persons. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 10-45 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The provisions of § 10-45-71 do not apply to the transportation of passengers by a nonprofit organization whose primary activity is the relief of elderly or disabled persons, if the nonprofit organization is recognized as an exempt organization under § 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code. Section 2. That chapter 10-46 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The provisions of § 10-46-58 do not apply to the transportation of passengers by a nonprofit organization whose primary activity is the relief of elderly or disabled persons, if the nonprofit organization is recognized as an exempt organization under § 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
